endpoints.description: Retrieve historical and forecasted market trends data for the specified industrial sub-sector.
Submit hypothetical market scenarios to understand potential impacts in the industrial sector.
Get a summarized analysis of actionable insights for the specified industry category.
Access graphical visualizations and analytics representations of market trends.
Send parameters to predict future demands for specific industrial category products.
Obtain comparative statistics between multiple industrial sub-sectors.
Provide input for optimal resource allocation recommendations based on trends.
Retrieve distribution analysis data of industrial resources and demands by region.
Submit criteria to generate investment opportunities and risk assessments.
Access comprehensive documentation and guides about the dataset and methodologies utilized by this service.
